alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; Oklahoma; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 4:43AM CDT until June 10 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... Northeastern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Eastern Logan County in central Oklahoma... Payne County in central Oklahoma... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 442 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Quay to near Mulhall, moving south at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...The Stillwater ASOS measured a 71 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Oklahoma City, eastern Edmond, Stillwater, Guthrie, Cushing, Chandler, Choctaw, Harrah, Perkins, Jones, Stroud, Prague, Langston, Yale, Luther, Meeker, Davenport, Wellston, Carney and Tryon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
